name: Encore
long_description: Encore is building the Perplexity for online shopping, with an initial emphasis on resale. We make it easy to find and manage unique treasures from across the internet. With our conversational search engine, you can seamlessly browse and refine your search across hundreds of resale platforms like Depop, eBay, Grailed, Poshmark, and more. Get inspired, follow product influencers, read unbiased reviews, receive styling tips, learn about trends, and even find items inspired by TV shows, movies, or social mediaâ€”all in one place.
